content: Oh, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I just remembered. Someone stopped by our planet earlier, while you were at home. {A左右看}She's my friend's aunt's uncle's aunt's cousin's granddaughter.
info: 神秘访客-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho! She should be wandering around nearby. {A挠头}If you're not too busy, could you bring her back here for me?

content: Thank you so much! She should be around here... I've marked it on the <style=Highlight>map</style> on your <style=Highlight>phone</style>.
